pr_title: [BEAM-9598] Ensuring _CustomBigQuerySource ValueProvider is only checked when strictly needed

timeline.bodyText: Isn't it correct to ensure that query is accessible, since it may be used in the call to _start_query_job below?
timeline.author: TheNeuralBit

replies.bodyText: Ah so you partially answered my question in your comment. Is there any risk of this breaking the query path?
replies.author: TheNeuralBit

replies.bodyText:
The query path will still error out if a query is not provided to the template, but it will work fine when it is provided. There are tests for BQ that use the query path (see [1],[2])
[1] https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/sdks/python/apache_beam/io/gcp/big_query_query_to_table_pipeline.py#L82-L87
[2] https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/sdks/python/apache_beam/io/gcp/big_query_query_to_table_it_test.py#L158-L179
replies.author: pabloem
